 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקַד‎</span> **verb** ==skip about== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el, Hiph\`il = Biblical Hebrew; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְקַד‎</span> Pa\`el, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ra‡âdu***</u></abbr>, ***skip, dance***;, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IX. ***run with leaps and bounds***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***leaping up briskly***); — 

**Qal** ***skip about, Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽקְדוּ‎</span> [[Ps.114.4|Ps 114:4]] (of mountains, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּאֵילִים‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְקְדוּ‎</span> v[[Ps.114.6|Ps 114:6]] (id.; both of Sinai quaking at law-giving); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵת רְקוֺד‎</span> [[Eccl.3.4|Eccl 3:4]] a time to mourn (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפֹד‎</span>), and ***a time to skip about*** (gaily). **Pi\`el** ***dance, leap: Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַקְּדוּ‎</span> [[Isa.13.21|Isa 13:21]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂעִירִים‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַקֵּר֑וּן‎</span> [[Job.21.11|Job 21:11]] (of children; merrily), [[Joel.2.5|Joel 2:5]](of locusts); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַקֵּד‎</span> [[1Chr.15.29|1Chr 15:29]] (of David; = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְכַרְכֵּר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַזֵּז‎</span>, in \|\| [[2Sam.6.14|2Sam 6:14]]; [[2Sam.6.16|2Sam 6:16]]); feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַקֵּדָה‎</span> [[Nah.3.2|Nah 3:2]] (of jolting chariots); in [[2Sam.6.21|2Sam 6:21]] a insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרַקֵּד‎</span> ***I will dance***, after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַקֵּד‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּרְקִידֵם‎</span> [[Ps.29.6|Ps 29:6]] ***he*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***made them skip*** like calves (trees, by lightning). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַקָּה‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רקק‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַקּוֺן‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רקק‎</span>.
